page.title: 13Religion
page.content: In Tonbridge the major religion is{Christianity.}In the school survey that we carried out recently,more people didn't go to church than did. Out of the classes we surveyed, 66 people didn't go and 48 people did.The churches that they went to were The Parish church and St.Stephen's which are{Church of England}churches,and the{Baptist}and{Methodist.}Of those {who }went to church most went to the morning service, and only one went to the evening service.Quite a lot of children went to{church clubs},like Scouts, Guides and Boys Brigade, but not so many went to{Sunday School.
